channel.title: Lab 2 Grading Checklist :: CIS 527 Textbook
channel.description: Windows Manifest (5) Compiles Runs Without Errors Comments for any modules to install Windows Configuration (10) Users (cis527, AdminUser, NormalUser, GuestUser, EvilUser) Groups (Administrators, Users, Files) Software (Firefox, Thunderbird, Notepad++) Windows Files (10) Run Get-ChildItem -Recurse | Get-Acl | Format-List Check for groups and user on each folder Ubuntu Manifest (5) Compiles Runs Without Errors Comments for any modules to install Ubuntu Configuration (10) Users (cis527, AdminUser, NormalUser, GuestUser, EvilUser) Groups (files) Software (Firefox, Thunderbird, Synaptic) Ubuntu Files (10) Run ls -lR Check for groups and user on each folder
